analysis.description:
CIBUSToken.refundTokens (/unique_contracts/0xbbca7197c4bf733d8fd38751733864b70851cb87.sol#390-399) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_refund,_value) (/unique_contracts/0xbbca7197c4bf733d8fd38751733864b70851cb87.sol#399)
